data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, bring yourself glory in Grand' Anse. Through your servants plant 7 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Grand‘ Anse, Seychelles to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Grand' Anse that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Grand' Anse. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
